page.title: 14 YSGOL PENMORFA
page.content: There are 339 pupils in {Ysgol {Penmorfa},in four Junior classes ,five infant classes and a nursery.In the school we have three computers with disc drives,tape recorders,radios, televisions and record players . A teacher visits to teach Welsh and there is another visiting teacher to teach violin. There is also a specialist teacher who comes to help children who fall behind in their work. The 4th year juniors look after other classes at break time. Our 11 teachers aren't the only staff in the school,we also have 8 kitchen staff,4 dinner ladies ,a secretary,a caretaker,3 nursery assistants and 3 cleaning ladies who clean up after we have gone home. After school we have activity clubs,such as computer, rounders,cycling,football and netball.
